'''''Cineas''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must defeat the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Primordial Bathysmal Vishap|text=Cineas &mdash; Unreturned Envoy.}}

==Gameplay Notes==
* Cineas can be found in [[Clivus Capitolinus|Capitolium: Old Palace]], in the [[Sea of Bygone Eras]].
*:<gallery>
Achievement Cineas Location.png|Map Location
Achievement Cineas Location Context.png|Location Context
</gallery>

==Trivia==
* [https://wikipedia.org/wiki/Cineas Cineas] was an advisor of King Pyrrhus.
